reviews.review_msg: Really nice, really kind lady, with a good teaching skill and clear lecture note which she even print for students. Moreover, she is really patient for answering questions. She is the best calculus professor I have ener seen

She is the worst teacher one can have for math. Gives long assignments filled with lengthy questions, then asks tough questions on the exam and refuses to elaborate on the criteria based on which she assigns students marks. She blatantly asks us to watch videos of another prof at SFU named Jamie, even during class. Nothing is covered during class.
